1.content: Choose a beginning. You have to be at least relevant to the title of the chapter.
1.title: Begin

12.content: You ever what it would be like to swap butts With a woman Said your science friend Molly swapping your man butt with her sexy thicc ass with a Ray Gun. Without hesitation she asked you how it feels?
12.title: You ever wonder...

info.brief_description: Write two sentences and two choices. Keep it going as long as you can
info.description: Write 2 sentences then 2 choices. Keep it going even if it strays from the plot. Keep it consistent. Nothing too graphic but innuendo and cursing is fine. Try not to exceed more than 2 f-bombs
